::Spears::
The rocket hit the face of the rock but blew off the top half in 
which she was hiding behind. She was hit by flying bits of rock.  Her 
face cut and her side with bits of inbedded rock in her skin.  She 
stood and was about to throw a spear when she heard Shadow Wing call 
out. She crouched low behind what was left of the large rock and 
waited.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> She took another shot to her injured wing and fluttered to the 
ground.
> She transformed to bot mode and walked up to Unitron. She turned 
and 
> yelled to the other Maximals. "HOLD YOUR FIRE! THEY HAVE A HOSTAGE!"
> She turned and looked at Unitron.
> "Have you no honor. Let him go and take me instead."
> She couldn't believe she just said that.
>
